from bigfloat import *


def findFirstRepeat(number) : #recursive
  divide = len(number)/2
  if(divide == 0) :
    return None
  half = number[:divide]
  next = findFirstRepeat(number[:-1])
  if next != None or half != number[divide:] :
    return next
  return half


def findFirstRepeat(number) :
  sub = number
  found = None
  while len(sub) > 2 :
    divide = len(sub)/2
    half = sub[:divide]
    if half == sub[divide:] :
      found = half
    sub = sub[:-1]
  return found


def removeAll(string, substring) :
  if substring != None :
    value = string
    bite = len(substring)
    while len(value) >= bite and value[:bite] == substring :
      value = value[bite:]
    return value


prec = 10000
longest = 1
d = 0
for i in range(1, 1000) :
  orig = ""
  with precision(prec) :
    orig = str(div(1, i))
  sub = findFirstRepeat(orig[5:-5])
  if sub == None : continue
  sublen = len(sub) 
  if sublen > longest :
    longest = sublen
    d = i
    print "1/%d = %s -> %s (%s)" % (d, orig, sub, longest)
      
      
  if sublen > len(orig) / 3 :
    precision *= 2
